HEADER.TITLE: MedTagger
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: Open Source platform for aggregation and annotation of medical images powered by crowdsourcing.

DESCRIPTION.SIGN_IN: Good to see you back! Log in and continue your work.
DESCRIPTION.SIGN_UP: Start labeling with MedTagger today. It is easy! Just take your time and fill this registration form and you are ready to go.

MARKER.SCREEN_INFO: Please use bigger screen to start labeling.
MARKER.ZOOM_INFO: Use mouse wheel button click to drag zoomed image.

NO_TAGS.TITLE: There are no tags assigned to this task!

NO_TASK.TITLE: You did not choose task properly!

NO_SCANS.TITLE: Nothing to do here!
NO_SCANS.CONTENT: No more Scans available for you in this dataset!

EMPTY_LABEL.TITLE: You are trying to send empty label
EMPTY_LABEL.CONTENT: Are you sure that there are no interesting objects to tag in the whole scan?
EMPTY_LABEL.BUTTON_CANCEL: No, take me back to labeling.

SINGLE_SELECTION.TITLE: You are trying to send single selection
SINGLE_SELECTION.CONTENT: Remember you should create 3D selection. Use scroll wheel or arrow buttons to change slices and select objects there.

SINGLE_TAG.TITLE: You are trying to send incomplete selections
SINGLE_TAG.CONTENT: There are no selections for some of the tags. Are you sure that there are no interesting objects to select for other tags?

ZOOM.TITLE: Image Window
ZOOM.SUBTITLE: Correct image brightness and contrast by tuning parameters below

DESCRIPTION.TITLE: Task description
DESCRIPTION.SUBTITLE: Information about the task and selections

TOOLTIPS.RECT_TOOL: Rectangle tool. Use it to select rectangular region of interest by dragging mouse over given image part.
TOOLTIPS.BRUSH_TOOL: Brush tool. Mark interesting objects on image using freehand technique.
TOOLTIPS.POINT_TOOL: Point tool. Add point selection by clicking on displayed image.
TOOLTIPS.CHAIN_TOOL: Polyline tool. Add another vertices to image and form polygon or polyline.
TOOLTIPS.IMG_WINDOW: Contrast window. Manipulate window parameters to brighten/darken image or add contrast.
TOOLTIPS.ZOOM_IN: Zoom in by a factor x2. Navigate on the zoomed image using mouse scroll button drag.
TOOLTIPS.ZOOM_OUT: Zoom out by a factor x2. Navigate on the zoomed image using mouse scroll button drag.
TOOLTIPS.COMMENT: Add text label to created selection. Your text will be send to platform along the graphic selection.
TOOLTIPS.SKIP_SCAN: Request another image to tag, leaving current for future analysis.
TOOLTIPS.NO_TAG: Send empty selection. Use this button where there are no task bound objects to tag on all slices of scan.
TOOLTIPS.SEND_SCAN: Send selections from all slices of current scan.

USERS.TITLE: Users
USERS.SUBTITLE: Browse users and change their's privilages

INFO.USER_VALIDATION_FAILED: User data has not been updated due to a validation failure.

TUTORIAL.DONT_SHOW_AGAIN: Do not show this tutorial again

SINGLE.TITLE: Single 3D Scan
SINGLE.DESCRIPTION: Select this option if you want to upload a single 3D Scan.

MULTIPLE.TITLE: Multiple 3D Scans
MULTIPLE.DESCRIPTION: Select this option if you want to upload multiple 3D Scans.

BEFORE_SELECTION.TITLE: Single 3D Scan
BEFORE_SELECTION.DESCRIPTION: Go to the directory containing CT Scan and select all DICOM files (*.dcm).
BEFORE_SELECTION.WARNING:
Not all of your files will be uploaded!
Some of them may be corrupted or incompatible with MedTagger.

AFTER_SELECTION.TITLE: Selected Scans
AFTER_SELECTION.DESCRIPTION:
You can also specify Predefined Label which will be shown initially
on the Labeling Page. To do so, send "TASK_KEY.json" file together with your DICOM files.

BEFORE_SELECTION.TITLE: Multiple 3D Scans
BEFORE_SELECTION.DESCRIPTION: Select parent directory that contains subdirectories with CT Scans.
BEFORE_SELECTION.WARNING:
Not all of your files will be uploaded!
Some of them may be corrupted or incompatible with MedTagger.

AFTER_SELECTION.TITLE: Selected Scans
AFTER_SELECTION.DESCRIPTION:
You can also specify Predefined Label which will be shown initially
on the Labeling Page. To do so, send "TASK_KEY.json" file together with your DICOM files.

SUMMARY.LABEL: Summary
SUMMARY.TITLE: Upload Summary
SUMMARY.DESCRITPION:
Upload completed sucessfully!
All of your scans are now available for labeling.
SUMMARY.WARNING:
There were some issues with uploading your scans!
Your files may be corrupted or incompatible with MedTagger.
SUMMARY.ERROR:
None of your scans were uploaded properly!
Your files may be corrupted or incompatible with MedTagger.

LABEL_EXPLORER.NO_LABELS_FOR_TAG: There are no labels for this tag.
LABEL_EXPLORER.NO_LABELS_ADDED: No labels have been added so far.
LABEL_EXPLORER.ADD_LABELS: Add new labels using available tools.

TOOLTIPS.BTN_REMOVE: Remove this selection. This operation will permamently delete selection, use carefully.
TOOLTIPS.BTN_PIN: Pin selection to have it on view when changing slices of scan.
TOOLTIPS.BTN_VISIBLE: Toggle visibility of this selection on current slice.

MESSAGE.SELECT_TAG: Please select Tag and Tool to start labeling.
MESSAGE.SELECT_TOOL: Please select Tool to start labeling.

TASK_EXPLORER.ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error while downloading tasks

OPERATION.DRAG_TO_SELECT: Use mouse drag to create labels
OPERATION.CLICK_TO_SELECT: Use left mouse click to create labels
